ygData.subject: RE: Rumors
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Abashi has said that there aren t going to be changes to the SSOY. Whether this holds true or not... Never heard of the drum Bien
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>
>
> Last night in lower guk a fellow was auctioning a "shark-skin drum" that
> he
> said he picked up in Kedge Keep and he claimed that a bard friend who
> tested
> it for him said that it was about 15% faster speed increase over the MM
> drum. I tried to trade an Enameled Black Chestplate for it but he wanted
> like 10kpp worth of stuff for it.
>
> He also told me his Ykesha was only for trade for 10kpp worth of loot but
> that he was planning on probably holding on to it until after Verant
> "makes
> the patch that changes the Ykesha to a warrior only weapon" and the price
> "goes through the roof".
>
> Anyone have any knowledge/comments on these rumors?
>
> -Faras
>
Abashi has said that there aren't going to be changes to the SSOY.
Whether this holds true or not...

Never heard of the drum

Bien
